backend/main.mo: Defines backend actor with storage mixins, admin auth, and data models for vehicles, media, promotions, blogs, contacts, and interactions.
feature_evidence.json: Lists feature evidence entries mapping features to affected files, components, tests, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains prewritten summaries of multiple frontend files describing their purpose and functionality.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining design tokens, theme variables, and dark mode styles.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point loading the React app via main.tsx.
frontend/REDEPLOYMENT.md: Documentation describing how to rebuild, redeploy, and manually validate the frontend canister.
frontend/src/admin/AdminGuard.tsx: Protects admin routes by validating session, handling emergency bypass mode, and showing loading or access-denied states.
frontend/src/admin/AdminLayout.tsx: Provides the admin dashboard layout with sidebar navigation, active-state logic, and logout handling.
frontend/src/admin/auth/adminSession.ts: Manages admin session storage, migration from legacy keys, cookie handling, and bypass session creation.
Enables a temporary authentication bypass with predefined super admin data for debugging.
frontend/src/admin/components/AccessDeni: Displays an access-denied message with a button redirecting back to the admin login page.
frontend/src/admin/components/BlogFormDi: Dialog form for creating or editing blog posts, managing form state, validation defaults, and image selection.
frontend/src/admin/components/ConfirmDel: Reusable confirmation dialog for delete actions with configurable text and loading state.
Generic CRUD table with search, custom column rendering, published status display, and edit/delete actions.
frontend/src/admin/components/media/Medi: Media management panel that lists, filters, and deletes media assets with error handling and confirmation dialog.
Dialog to search and select a media asset, handling loading, errors, and current selection state.
Button component to upload media files, converting them to data URLs and sending them to the backend with status feedback.
frontend/src/admin/components/PromotionF: Dialog with form fields to create or edit a promotion, handling state, image selection, and save submission.
frontend/src/admin/components/Testimonia: Dialog for creating or editing testimonials with fields for customer info, review details, image selection, and save handling.
frontend/src/admin/components/VehicleFor: Complex vehicle editor dialog with tabs for basic info, variants, specs, and commercial features, supporting image and brochure selection.
frontend/src/admin/components/vehicles/C: Renders a list of commercial vehicle feature checkboxes and updates the feature state on toggle.
frontend/src/admin/components/vehicles/T: Provides form inputs for technical specs and lets users add or remove additional features.
frontend/src/admin/components/vehicles/V: Manages creation, editing, and deletion of vehicle variants with feature lists and pricing adjustments.
frontend/src/admin/hooks/useAdminCmsQuer: Defines React Query hooks for fetching and mutating admin CMS data such as media assets, contacts, and credit simulations.
frontend/src/admin/hooks/useAdminLoginDe: Empty placeholder export kept only to avoid breaking imports.
frontend/src/admin/hooks/useAdminSession: Handles admin session validation, login, logout, and optional emergency bypass logic.
frontend/src/admin/pages/AdminLoginDebug: UI page for testing admin login by manually submitting credentials and viewing the result.
Admin login screen handling authentication, emergency bypass redirects, and form submission.
frontend/src/admin/pages/AdminProfilePag: Admin profile editor allowing viewing and updating user profile fields.
frontend/src/admin/pages/BlogAdminPage.t: Blog management interface supporting search, create, edit, and delete operations for blog posts.
frontend/src/admin/pages/DashboardPage.t: Dashboard displaying summary stats for vehicles, promotions, testimonials, blogs, contacts, and simulations.
Leads management page for viewing, searching, and deleting contact form entries and credit simulations.
frontend/src/admin/pages/MediaManagerPag: Media manager page showing media assets with upload support and session-expired handling.
frontend/src/admin/pages/PromotionsAdmin: Promotions management UI enabling search, creation, editing, and deletion of promotions.
frontend/src/admin/pages/TestimonialsAdm: Admin page for listing, searching, creating, editing, and deleting testimonials using dialogs and a CRUD table.
frontend/src/admin/pages/VehiclesAdminPa: Admin interface to manage vehicles with category filtering, search, and create/edit/delete dialogs.
frontend/src/admin/pages/VisitorStatsAdm: Displays visitor stats and provides a form to update stored visitor analytics.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Configures all public and admin routes using TanStack Router and wires layouts and pages.
frontend/src/components/forms/ContactFor: Form for submitting contact inquiries, validating required fields, and sending data via mutation.
frontend/src/components/forms/CreditSimu: Form to submit credit simulation requests with validation and mutation-based submission.
frontend/src/components/GlobalErrorBound: Global React error boundary that shows a fallback UI and allows reloading the page on errors.
frontend/src/components/layout/Footer.ts: Renders the site footer with contact info, social links, branding, and a dynamic year.
frontend/src/components/layout/PublicLay: Defines the public page layout with navbar, optional hero, content area, CTA sections, and footer.
frontend/src/components/navigation/Botto: Provides a mobile bottom bar with quick actions for calling, WhatsApp, credit simulation, and menu access.
frontend/src/components/navigation/MainM: Displays a slide‑up menu sheet listing main navigation links.
frontend/src/components/navigation/Navba: Implements the top navigation bar with logo, links, WhatsApp button, and a mobile sheet menu.
frontend/src/components/sections/BottomC: Shows a bottom CTA banner encouraging WhatsApp contact with a call‑to‑action button.
frontend/src/components/sections/HeroSec: Displays a simple hero banner with a title and subtitle.
frontend/src/components/vehicles/Vehicle: Renders a vehicle card with image, details, price, features, and buttons for details and WhatsApp consultation.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor based on user identity, invalidating related queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides context and utilities for Internet Identity login, identity loading, and status tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching and mutating public data such as vehicles, blogs, interactions, contacts, and credit simulations through an actor API.
frontend/src/hooks/useVisitorTracking.ts: Tracks unique visitors and page views using session storage and mutation hooks.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining theme variables, dark mode styles, and base global styles.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes React app with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/BlogDetailPage.tsx: Displays a single blog post, updates SEO metadata, and handles loading or missing-post states.
frontend/src/pages/BlogListPage.tsx: Fetches and renders a grid of blog posts with links to detail pages.
frontend/src/pages/CommercialVehicleDeta: Shows detailed info for a commercial vehicle with liking and sharing actions.
frontend/src/pages/CommercialVehiclesPag: Lists commercial vehicles grouped by category such as light, medium, and tractor head.
frontend/src/pages/ContactPage.tsx: Displays a contact form along with static contact details, map, and consultant info.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Renders the homepage with a banner carousel, featured vehicles, search functionality, and latest blog posts.
frontend/src/pages/PassengerVehicleDetai: Displays detailed information for a specific passenger vehicle, including variants, pricing, and share/like actions.
frontend/src/pages/PassengerVehiclesPage: Lists all published passenger vehicles with loading and empty-state handling.
frontend/src/pages/PromoPage.tsx: Shows a list of current promotions with images, descriptions, and validity details.
frontend/src/pages/TestimonialsPage.tsx: Displays customer testimonials with ratings, images, and review text.
frontend/src/redeploy/routeSmoke.ts: Defines public and admin routes for smoke testing and provides utilities to generate checklists and validate router configuration.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for extracting, storing, and managing URL and session parameters, including hash-based routing support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: TailwindCSS config enabling dark mode, content scanning, extended color system, custom animations, and typography/container/animate plugins.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing current architecture, requirements, known issues, and admin/CMS/auth-related constraints for an automotive website platform.
